sentences.english: Airplanes grounded because of the fog have already taken off.
sentences.chinese: 受到大霧影響而停飛的班機已全部復航。
士兵離開運輸航登陸了。

sentences.english: But when he was at sea he could seem distant.
sentences.chinese: 但是當他在海上航行時似乎就很是遙遠了。

sentences.english: Submarine motion at the periscope depth, will suffer the interference that comes from waves.
sentences.chinese: 潛艇在潛望鏡深度航行時，會受到來自波浪的干擾力。

sentences.english: About us Established in Qingdao, China in 2003 Empire-Sky Logistics Co.

sentences.english: He that wod sail without danger must never come on the main sea.
sentences.chinese: 誰在航行時不冒險，他就永遠不要來到大海上。

sentences.english: Such a system might have been able to track Malaysian Airlines flight MH370.
sentences.chinese: 這種系統可能可以追蹤失蹤的馬航MH370。

sentences.english: These Procedures apply to the protection of aviation gasoline pipelines and related administrative activities.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法適用於航油管線的保護及其相關的管理活動。

sentences.english: Why is Shanghai Airlines leaving Star Alliance?

sentences.english: Postflight check found L outboard main wheel exposed threads due punctured.

sentences.english: After replaced No. 2 ATC transceiver, test OK.
sentences.chinese: 航後更換左主輪，檢查正常。

sentences.english: Replaced L main wheel in postflight, check OK.
sentences.chinese: 航後更換左主輪，檢查正常。

sentences.english: We are planning to go to new York by sea.
sentences.chinese: 他們在地中海上航行時過得很。

sentences.english: It came by airmail from our London office.
sentences.chinese: 是我們倫敦辦事處航郵匯來的。

sentences.english: Sail on lilver girl, sail on by, Your time has come to shine.
sentences.chinese: 啓航吧，向前航，你的時代即將大放光芒。

sentences.english: Cathay Pacifics hiring British pilots at a high salary.
